text: Adam Maciej Odzimek (7 October 1944 - 13 March 2022) was a Polish Roman Catholic prelate. He was the Auxiliary Bishop of Sandomierz from 1985 until 1992 and Radom from 1992 until 2019. Odzimek was born in Radom, Poland. He became a priest in 1969. Odzimek died on 13 March 2022 in Radom, aged 77.Zmar≈Ç bp Adam Odzimek ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish Roman Catholic bishops
title: Adam Odzimek
